title: The requirements prescribed above for items (g) are for Master Layout area up to & inclusive of 200 ha
clause_text: The requirements prescribed above for items (g) are for Master Layout area up to & inclusive of 200 ha. It shall be increased or decreased proportionately and may be proposed at one or more locations, as per requirements.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
